thread.title: Is positive thinking making us depressed?
thread.title_full: Is positive thinking making us depressed? - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Is positive thinking making us depressed?
text:
According to a Danish psychologist the emphasis on positive thinking in modern psychology is why young people are so anxious and depressed.
Professor Svend Brinkmann, who wrote Stand Firm: Resisting the Self-Improvement Craze, tells the Today programme we should speak about negative things and "not cloud them in positive thoughts".
